channel.title: xcom2 on Too Real
channel.description: Recent content in xcom2 on Too Real

item.title: Load Order
item.description: This article investigate what kinds of load orders there are in XCOM 2 and how to work with them…

item.title: Multitasking
item.description: This article explains the different kinds of parallelism and concurrency happening in XCOM 2 and UnrealScript despite the engine’s single-threaded nature…

item.title: History
item.description: This article reviews the XCOM 2 implementation of the MVC architecture and investigates some finer details and consequences…
